step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your body relaxed as you prepare to inhale.
Great job placing your hands on your abdomen to feel the breath.
Excellent! Inhale through your nose, gently tightening your body and imagining fluid moving to your chest.
Perfect! Exhale through your mouth, relaxing your muscles and visualizing pushing fluid out.
You're doing great! Continue to sit or stand comfortably.
Well done! Keep your hands on your abdomen to monitor your breathing.
Fantastic! Remember to inhale through your nose, tighten your muscles, and visualize fluid moving towards your chest.
Excellent work! Exhale through your mouth, relax your body, and visualize pushing fluid away.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with deep breathing! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. This helps stimulate lymphatic drainage and improve oxygen flow. Keep up the good work!
